title: Hot and Cold
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 38 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: What types of things are hot? What types of things are cold? This repetitive text introduces the concepts of hot and cold while providing an opportunity for readers to visualize hot and cold, and use high-frequency words.
meta: cold, food, hot, people, place, things
Classify Information : Classify things that are hot and cold
Capitalization : Recognize and understand capitalization at the beginning of sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify, write, and correctly use high-frequency words a, be, can, or

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
